str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A learner, disciple, pupil. From manthano; a learner, i.e. Pupil.

parse: Verb - Pluperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From apo and erchomai; to go off, aside or behind, literally or figuratively.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A city, the inhabitants of a city. Probably from the same as polemos, or perhaps from polus; a town.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To buy. From agora; properly, to go to market, i.e. to purchase; specially, to redeem.
Food, nourishment, maintenance. From trepho; nourishment; by implication, rations.
